text.autoconfig.compactstatuseffects.opt: Effect display module to use
No Name display config
UI offset with active effects
Distance between status effects and GUI
Squash effects together
Show effect's level
Show level as arabic number
Maximum number of effects in 1 column
Controls how many effects are displayed before a new column is used
Only Name display config
UI offset with active effects
Distance between status effects and GUI
Squash effects together
Maximum number of effects in 1 column
Controls how many effects are displayed before a new column is used
Colour of a permanent effect
Colour of an effect that won't expire soon
Colour of soon to expire effect
Colour of an expiring effect
Bound for expiring effect in seconds
Effect below this are considered expiring, above - soon to expire
expiring < bound < soon to expire
Bound for soon to expire effects in seconds
Effect below this are considered soon to expire, above - won't expire soon
soon to expire < bound < won't expire soon
